name: Minecraft Vanilla
description: Minecraft server with host-mounted files and runtime-downloaded server jars.

agreement.title: Minecraft EULA
agreement.text: You must accept the Minecraft End User License Agreement before creating this server.

composeInline:
services:
  minecraft:
    image: {{MINECRAFT_RUNTIME_IMAGE}}
    container_name: vestri-{{SERVER_SLUG}}
    ports:
      - "25565:25565"
    environment:
      JAVA_ARGS: "{{MINECRAFT_JAVA_ARGS}}"
      SERVER_DIR: "/server"
      SERVER_JAR_NAME: "{{MINECRAFT_SERVER_JAR_NAME}}"
      SERVER_ARGS: "{{MINECRAFT_SERVER_START_ARGS}}"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/server
    stdin_open: true
    tty: true
    restart: unless-stopped
